name: International Summer School: Gender in Cinema
content: Spend an amazing week learning about gender, psychoanalysis and cinema! In this course, we will explore cinematic representations of gender, in themes linked to identity formation, femininity, masculinity, gender bending, beauty, and ontology. It will include 6 two-hour online lectures and seminars covering the following topics and discussing the following films: IDENTITY FORMATION, FEMININITIES, MASCULINITIES, GENDER BENDING, BEAUTY, ONTOLOGY. Mary Wild (@psycstar) is the creator of the PROJECTIONS lecture series at Freud Museum London. Mary co-hosts the Projections Podcast, and creates exclusive content on Patreon. We are looking forward to applications from students, researchers and professionals with a particular interest related to gender studies, film studies and psychoanalysis. A Certificate of Completion will be provided by the end of the week. In order to book a place, please register on https://registration.lcir.co.uk. Contact email address: genderstudies@lcir.co.uk.
